p: Anti-thirst effects of PO was shown (Amiri and Joharchi, 2013 ▶). Several studies from different countries also reported the effect of PO on thirst, including Al-Nafis, (1999) ▶, Irawan et al. (2003) ▶, Keter and Mutiso, (2011) ▶, Handral et al. (2012) ▶, Syed et al. (2016) ▶, and Mastud et al. (2018) ▶ from South Africa, Indonesia, Kenya, India, and India, respectively.
